{"post_stream":{"posts":[{"id":3174890,"name":"Jim simpson","username":"JSIMPSO","avatar_template":"/letter_avatar_proxy/v4/letter/j/e9a140/{size}.png","created_at":"2023-03-28T02:50:36.331Z","cooked":"

Sample fixed sized dashboards with playing fields and robot(s) can be found here. These are based on the standard LabVIEW dashboard with auto-resize disabled and set to a fixed size. The WPILIB LabVIEW Math library is required to run and build these examples.
